name: live-video-streamer
description: Ultra low-latency live video streaming over CDN
author: Spectral Compute

scripts.bundle: (cd client && yarn bundle "$@") && (cd dev-client && yarn bundle "$@") && (cd demo-client && yarn bundle "$@")
scripts.bundle-dev: (cd client && yarn bundle-dev "$@") && (cd dev-client && yarn bundle-dev "$@") && (cd demo-client && yarn bundle-dev "$@")
scripts.clean: rm -rf docs/dist && yarn foreach clean && rm -rf node_modules package .yarn */node_modules
scripts.foreach: (cd common && yarn "$@") && (cd client && yarn "$@") && (cd demo-client && yarn "$@") && (cd dev-client && yarn "$@")
scripts.test: (cd common && yarn test) && (cd client && yarn test)
